meshplus.idl File Reference

Detailed Description

Abstract layer for the Meshes; see MESH+ Module.

Buffer Open Modes.

Identifies various modes in which a buffer can be open.

See IMeshBuffer::Open.

enum  MESH_OPENMODES { MESH_OPEN_READ = 0, MESH_OPEN_APPEND = 1, MESH_OPEN_MODIFY = 2, MESH_OPEN_UNUSED = 0x7fffffff }

Vertex Format Tags

Identifies various items of the vertex structure.

See IMeshVertexBuffer::GetCaps.

Remarks:
Values of this enumeration correspond to MESH_VERTEX calues as indices to mask flags.


enum  MESH_VERTEXID {
  MESH_VERTEXID_XYZ = 0, MESH_VERTEXID_NORMAL = 1, MESH_VERTEXID_POINTSIZE = 2, MESH_VERTEXID_DIFFUSE = 3,
  MESH_VERTEXID_SPECULAR = 4, MESH_VERTEXID_BONEWEIGHT = 5, MESH_VERTEXID_BONEINDEX = 6, MESH_VERTEXID_TEXTURE = 7,
  MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED1 = 8, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED2 = 9, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED3 = 10, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED4 = 11,
  MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED5 = 12, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED6 = 13, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED7 = 14, MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED8 = 15,
  MESH_VERTEXID_UNUSED = 0x7fffffff
}

Vertex Format Requirement flags

Defines required items of the vertex format.

See IMeshVertexBuffer::Create. The actual format of the created buffer may be slightly different:

  • implementation may ignore some flags; check Format attr to check which specifiers have been applied
  • implementation may decrease nBones/nTextures values if technical restrictions apply
  • implementation may use own extended flags not listed below (first 16 bits are reserved)

Remarks:
Values of this enumeration correspond to MESH_VERTEXID calues mask flags to their indices


enum  MESH_VERTEX {
  MESH_VERTEX_XYZ = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_XYZ, MESH_VERTEX_NORMAL = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_NORMAL, MESH_VERTEX_POINTSIZE = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_POINTSIZE, MESH_VERTEX_DIFFUSE = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_DIFFUSE,
  MESH_VERTEX_SPECULAR = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_SPECULAR, MESH_VERTEX_BONEWEIGHT = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_BONEWEIGHT, MESH_VERTEX_BONEINDEX = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_BONEINDEX, MESH_VERTEX_TEXTURE = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_TEXTURE,
  MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED1 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED1, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED2 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED2, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED3 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED3, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED4 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED4,
  MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED5 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED5, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED6 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED6, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED7 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED7, MESH_VERTEX_RESERVED8 = 1 << MESH_VERTEXID_RESERVED8,
  MESH_VERTEX_UNUSED = 0x7fffffff
}
